errors.incompletePaymentProcess: The requested payment details could not be found. This issue may be caused by an incomplete order or payment process.

amount-info.chargeTooltip: {amount} has already been captured from the total amount.
amount-info.refundTooltip: {amount} were refunded from the total amount.

charge-modal.title: Capture amount
charge-modal.infoText: If the amount has not been paid yet, you can charge it whole or in part.
charge-modal.maximumAmount: Enter the amount you like to charge. The total amount is {amount}.

refund-modal.title: Refund an amount
refund-modal.infoText: In case something went wrong with the order, you can refund the amount to your customer. The order can be fully or partially refunded. At your discretion, you can also choose to overcompensate the buyer and refund more than the original Charge amount by either 15% or 75 USD/GBP/EUR or 8,400 YEN (whichever is less).
refund-modal.maximumAmount: Enter the amount you want to refund. The maximum refund amount is {refundAmountLimit}.

notification.missingReason: You must enter a reason for refunding an amount!

cancel-modal.title: Cancel charge
cancel-modal.infoText: In case something went wrong with the order, you can cancel the complete charge The order remains valid.
cancel-modal.infoTextReason: Enter a short reason for the cancellation to inform your customer.

notification.success: Successfully canceled charge for this payment.

notification.invalidTransaction: The payment process with Amazon Pay was unexpectedly cancelled. No receipt of payment was reported. Please check possible other incoming payments from other payment providers before sending this order.
notification.invalidChargePermission: An error occurred while obtaining transaction details from Amazon.
notification.partialCharge: Partial captures aren't fully supported yet by the plugin. If you would like to capture additional payments for this order, please use Seller Central. Make sure to set the payment status manually to the desired value (e.g. "Paid") after that.
notification.isPartialCharged: Warning: this order was captured partially.
